title: Celebrating the end of this year's Snowdown

We do. Read what website you're on.

Skin priority list 10-1
1.Any Ultimate Skin
2.Any legendary Skin
3.Any Legacy Skin
4.Pink Taric
5.A 1350 RP Skin
6.A Skin To Complete A Team Set
7.Any Skin That Is Not A Poppy Skin

9.Any Skin That Is Not A Yorick Skin
10.Any Skin That Is Bad

>4.Pink Taric
